name: Tower Survival
description:
You can craft items to kill the Droids coming to destroy your tower. Follow the visible item slots to create crafting stations and items. You can throw arrows by flinging your mouse.

It was made by me (Patrick D) and Senuk J.

We ran out of time but it's kinda playable. We learned a lot doing the jam so not all was worthless. The water is useless and many items don't have final textures.
